input.description:
String Value - The name of a configuration item defined in a configuration module.
Example: BMC_AR_System, BMC_Remedyforce
Unsupported Value(s): ServiceNow

An XML document providing the data template for single or multiple Concept elements.The task concept is an XML document containing specific elements used to assign multiple values to a single context item. Each value is associated with an element of the Concept.

output.description: An XML document providing the data template for single or multiple Concept elements.The task concept is an XML document containing specific elements used to assign multiple values to a single context item. Each value is associated with an element of the Concept.
Indicates whether or not the process completed successfully. Valid values: success, failure.
A process specific string that explains the value of success status

call-process.process-name: :AutoPilot-OA-Task_Management:Utilities:Translate Field Values to Enumerated Values for Single Task

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" /> <xsl:template match="@*|node()"> <xsl:if test="not(@name="") and not(@name="Task ID")"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*|node()" /> </xsl:copy> </xsl:if> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <items> <item> <field-id> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">1</xsl:text> </field-id> <schema>${schema}</schema> <id>${task id}</id> <fields> <xsl:copy-of select="//field" /> </fields> </item> </items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

xpath-expression.xpath: concat("Unable to create WorkInfo entry for: ", .)
concat("Unable to create WorkInfo because of the following: ", .)

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <objects> <object> <xsl:for-each select="//object"> <type> <xsl:value-of select="'${o type}'" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </type> <xsl:copy-of select="./*" /> </xsl:for-each> </object> </objects> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

xpath-expression.xpath: concat("Unable to create WorkInfo because of the following: ", .)

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="location" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(//task) > 0"> <xsl:copy-of select="//task" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${task}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description: This workflow will create a WorkInfo record for a given task. Any data provided in concept element fields will be updated.
